Simulators Documentation

class simulators.base_simulator.BaseSimulator(mesh_size: int = 32, output_path: str = 'simulations.h5')

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for PDE simulators.

collect_metadata(parameters: Dict[str, Any], execution_time: float) → Dict[str, Any]

Collect metadata specific to the simulation.

run_session(parameter_ranges: Dict[str, tuple], num_simulations: int) → None

Run a session of multiple simulations with varying parameters.

run_simulation(session_id: str, **parameters) → None

Run a single simulation, using custom problem setup and solver.

abstract setup_problem(**parameters) → Any

Set up the problem to be solved. Can return any data structure.

abstract solve_problem(problem_data: Any) → Any

Solve the problem. Returns the solution.

class simulators.poisson_simulator.PoissonSimulator(mesh_size: int = 32, output_path: str = 'simulations.h5')

Bases: BaseSimulator

Implementation of the Poisson equation simulator.

Set up the Poisson equation with given parameters.

Solve the Poisson equation.

Main function to run the Poisson simulations.
